Neighborhood Nestwatch technician data collection and submission protocols

This document takes you through the steps of collecting data in the field and submitting data through the Neighborhood Nestwatch (NN) technician data submission interface (located here <https://smbc.shinyapps.io/appNestwatchCRUD/>).
